ovdesc.p: This application maintains the external source records in INFO-BASIC format.

desc.p: Identifies each record by the id definations defined in XT.RECORD.DEFS for the external source.
Records are automatically generated by the 'XT' module programs. User can just see the fields in the records.
UNQ-ID.YYMMDD.HHMM UNQ-ID is formed by the ID-defination in the XT.RECORD.DEFS YYMMDD - TAKEN FROM THE SYSTEM HHMM - TAKEN FROM THE SYSTEM Total length should not exceed 50 characters.
This field holds the field of the external record. The fields are held as values. The field number of the external record is the value number.
